author: Al Jazeera
title: Trump steps up pressure on China as US coronavirus deaths mount
description: US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo also urges China to 'open up' and 'come clean' on the origin of the deadly pandemic.
content: The United States has stepped up its pressure on China over the coronavirus pandemic, with President Donald Trump saying that his administration was trying to determine where the deadly disease originated from, and Secretary of State Mike Pompeo calling on Be… [+3567 chars]
